Package utils

Class Utility

java.lang.Object
utils.Utility
public class Utility extends Object
Contains all utility functions for used by other class files.
Author:
Escalona, J.M.

    • setState

      public void setState(boolean state)
      Sets the state for verbose printing (via printMessage()).
      Parameters:
      state - True or False

    • printMessage

      public void printMessage(String className, String methodName, String text)
      Prints the message for diagnostics.
      Parameters:
      className - Class name who called the print out
      methodName - Method name who called the print out
      text - Details about the verbose print out

    • getGUIConsoleMessage

      public String getGUIConsoleMessage(String message)
      Print out format for GUI's console.
      Parameters:
      message - Message to be printed in the GUI console.
      Returns:
      Formatted GUI console printout containing the time the message was created.

    • dtNow

      public String dtNow()
      Returns a formatted datetime object in String form.
      Returns:
      Formatted datetime in format yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss

    • hexStringToByteArray

      public byte[] hexStringToByteArray(String s)
      Returns byte[] equivalent of hex string. Only issue being that it ommits any beginning hex value of 00 Reference: https://stackoverflow.com/a/8890335 > https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/java-program-to-convert-hex-string-to-byte-array/
      Parameters:
      s - Hex string
      Returns:
      byte[] equivalent of hex.

    • getBytesAsBits

      public String getBytesAsBits(byte[] bytes)
      Returns bit string equivalent of bytes. Example format: 00000001 00000010 00000011 ... Reference: https://stackoverflow.com/a/62318518
      Parameters:
      bytes - byte[] to be converted into bits
      Returns:
      Bit string equivalent of bytes

    • getBytesHex

      public String getBytesHex(byte[] bytes)
      Returns Hex equivalent of bytes ISSUES TO OVERFLOW DETERMINED SO CHECKING IS AVAILABLE BUT RESULT NEEDS FURTHER EXAMINATION
      Parameters:
      bytes - byte[] to be converted into Hex
      Returns:
      Hex string equivalent of bytes

    • getTempOutPath

      public String getTempOutPath(String filename)
      Returns a formatted temporary output path for a given filename. The path is simply a folder named 'temp' in the same folder as the program itself.
      Parameters:
      filename - Filename of the file.
      Returns:
      Formatted temporary output path of file

    • byteToByteArr

      public byte[] byteToByteArr(byte val)
      Returns byte[] equivalent of val.
      Parameters:
      val - byte val
      Returns:
      byte[] equivalent of val. Mainly a single item byte[]

    • writeMonitor

      public void writeMonitor(String className, String method, int bytesRead, int remainingBytes, int threshold, int blocksize)
      For monitoring a byte scan reaches threshold
      Parameters:
      className - Class name that called the function
      method - Method name that called the function
      bytesRead - Amount of bytes being read
      remainingBytes - Bytes left to read.
      threshold - Threshold limit for remaining bytes to trigger a print out
      blocksize - Expected byte size of bytesRead (TFTP default: 512)
